Package core

Class Layer

java.lang.Object
core.Layer
public class Layer
extends java.lang.Object
Class which represents each layer and stores the shapes in that layer.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private boolean isVisible  
    private java.lang.String name  
    private PApplet pApplet  
    private java.util.ArrayList<Shape> shapes

  • Constructor Details

    • Layer

      public Layer​(PApplet pApplet, int layerIndex)
      Default constructor for the Layer class.
      Parameters:
      pApplet - Handle for main PApplet.

    • Layer

      public Layer​(PApplet pApplet, java.lang.String name, boolean visibility)
      A constructor with more parameters for use during a direct DB load.
      Parameters:
      pApplet - Handle for main PApplet
      name - Name of the layer, can be anything.
      visibility - If the layer is visible when saved.

  • Method Details

    • addShape

      public void addShape​(ShapeType type, int beginX, int beginY, int endX, int endY, int color)
      Adds a new shape to the layer
      Parameters:
      type - Type of shape to add (Square, Triangle or Ellipse).
      beginX - X-coordinate of corner 1.
      beginY - Y-coordinate of corner 1.
      endX - X-coordinate of corner 2.
      endY - Y-coordinate of corner 2.
      color - Color of shape to add.

    • addShape

      public void addShape​(int x, int y, int w, int h, int stroke, int color, ShapeType type, java.lang.String name)
      Adds a shape to the layer using more direct parameters.
      Parameters:
      x - X- coordinate of the shape.
      y - Y- coordinate of the shape.
      w - Width of the shape.
      h - Height of the shape.
      stroke - The stroke color of the shape.
      color - Color of the shape.
      type - Type of shape to be added (Square, Triangle or Ellipse).
      name - Name of the shape.

    • draw

      public void draw()
      Draw call for this layer. Draws all the shapes.

    • select

      public void select()

      Performs a select operation, which selects the topmost layer under the mouse's current location in the currently selected layer, and then de-selects every other shape in that layer.

      If there is no shape from the current layer under the mouse, it de-selects everything in the current layer.

    • save

      public void save​(int x, int y, int w, int h, int color, java.lang.String name)
      Updates the currently selected shape with the parameter provided.
      Parameters:
      x - The X coordinate of the corner
      y - The Y coordinate of the corner
      w - The width of the shape
      h - The height of the shape
      color - The color of the shape
      name - The name of the shape

    • remove

      public void remove()
      Removes the currently selected shape if one is selected.

    • deselectAll

      public void deselectAll()
      Deselects all the shapes.

    • selectedShape

      public Shape selectedShape()
      Get the currently selected shape.
      Returns:
      The currently selected shape as a Shape object.

    • isVisible

      public boolean isVisible()
      Returns:
      True if this layer is visible.

    • toggleVisibility

      public void toggleVisibility()
      Toggles the visibility of the current layer.

    • getName

      public java.lang.String getName()
      Returns:
      The name of the current layer.

    • setName

      public void setName​(java.lang.String nameToSet)
      Parameters:
      nameToSet - The new name to set for the current layer.

    • getShapes

      public java.util.ArrayList<Shape> getShapes()
      Returns:
      All the shapes in the layer in an ArrayList.

    • getShape

      public Shape getShape​(int index)
      Gets a specific shape from this layer.
      Parameters:
      index - Index of the shape to get.
      Returns:
      The shape at that index.
